segments.text: Let me feel your forehead . I'm so glad it wasn't strep throat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't have a fever , and I'm ready for my test .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I'm not sure you're strong enough yet . Here's some seafood rice soup I made . It's delicious .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm fine , Mom . I feel so much better . I want to go to school . I'm missing out on all the fun .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But the last two days were a weekend .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me go to school , please ! I'm sick of medicine , sick of soup , and sick of being sick !
segments.speaker: S1
